nodes.text: Blue Wing was a starfighter wing that served in the Republic Navy and flew Aurek-class tactical strikefighters during the Jedi Civil War. In 3951 BBY, Blue Wing was one of two Aurek units instrumental in bringing the Old Sith Wars to an end. Under the command of Admiral Carth Onasi, the wing participated in the Battle of Telos IV where it fought against the Sith forces of Darth Nihilus.
